concept.title: Troubleshooting: Visualization Apps in WordPress Shortcode

row.entry: Check that you have the correct App ID
If you use more than one network, check that you are using the correct network.
Check that you are using the correct credentials.

The App ID is an alphanumeric string that Livefyre generates. You can find it within the Livefyre Application in the App you want to display in WordPress. For more help finding the App ID, contact Livefyre support at https://livefyre.zendesk.com/hc/en-us.
